Key Match Events: Eduardo Vargas scored a goal for Chile in the 2nd minute
Igor Jesus scored a goal for Brazil in the 45'+1' minute
Luiz Henrique scored a goal for Brazil in the 89' minute
Post-Match Reflections: Brazil had to recover from a goal down to secure the victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in Santiago, Chile
Others: The victory lifted Brazil to fourth in the standings with 13 points
Chile are second from bottom on five points
